history.proof: intros i L L1 L2 H. induction H. - unfold incl. intros x Hx. auto. - qsimpl time: 1. intros x Hx. qsimpl time: 1. - sfirstorder depth: 3.

ctx: intros i L L1 L2 H.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "incl L L3" on hypothesis of type "genPcP i L2 L L3".

ctx: intros i L L1 L2 H.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, (eqA b A0 -> False) -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {eqA a b -> False} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) L, L1, L2, L3 : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, i : poly A0 eqA ltM H : slice i a L1 = Keep L2 H0 : genPcP i L2 L L3 IHgenPcP : incl L L3 x : poly A0 eqA ltM Hx : In x L Unable to unify "genPcP i L2 L L3" with "In x (addEnd A A0 eqA n ltM (spolyp A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os i a) L3)".

ctx: intros i L L1 L2 H.
exceptions.exn: No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet -.

chat.content:
Help me to prove a theorem in Coq, based on provided proof states including hypotheses and goals. Give a complete proof in only one single code block without explanations, extra definitions. Give a complete proof in one response, only give the proof body, without repeating the definition and "Proof.". Avoid existing names when using intros. Write the commands separately, without ";" and "[cmd|cmd]". Use bullets for structure, NEVER use "{" and "}". When -, + and * are used out, proceed to double versions like --, ++, etc. For example, given proof state:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m
============================
m + S n = S n + m
The hypotheses n, m: nat and IHn: m + n = n + m are given first, then the goal, m + S n = S n + m, separated by =. Expect a response like: 
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.``` 
You do not intros any terms because all terms have already been introduced.

When I give:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m
============================
n, m: nat
your answer should be like:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```
Definitions and lemmas related to the proof will be provided, use them accordingly.


Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (i : poly A0 eqA ltM) (L L1 L2 : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)), genPcP i L1 L L2 -> incl L L2

Premises:
Fin.L : forall n0 : nat, Fin.t ?m -> Fin.t (?m + n0) where ?m : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n,
incl : forall A : Type, list A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive genPcP : poly A0 eqA ltM -> list (poly A0 eqA ltM) -> list (poly A0 eqA ltM) -> list (poly A0 eqA ltM) -> Prop := genPcP0 : forall (i : poly A0 eqA ltM) (L : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)), genPcP i nil L L | genPcP1 : forall (L L1 L2 L3 : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (a i : poly A0 eqA ltM), slice i a L1 = Keep L2 -> genPcP i L2 L L3 -> genPcP i (a :: L1) L (addEnd
poly : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, (mon n -> mon n -> Prop) -> Set
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
OrderStructure : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop
CoefStructure : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
genPcP_spolyp1 : forall (i : poly A0 eqA ltM) (L L1 L2 : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)), genPcP i L1 L L2 -> forall a : poly A0 eqA ltM, In a L2 -> (exists b : poly A0 eqA ltM, In b L1 /\ a = spolyp A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os i b) \/ In a L

```

original: intros i L L1 L2 H. induction H. - unfold incl. intros x Hx. auto. - apply IHgenPcP in H0. intros x Hx. unfold incl in H0. apply H0. apply Hx.
